data.message: Cullen, I tried to find out about the Monster jam tickets for June this year ( since you were so nice to tell me the date) which this was back in November that you told me..  but they are telling me that there is NO date for the Monster Trucks at Philadelphia... now how did you find out about this date? if I may ask you.. I'm trying to get tickets, but they are telling me it's not on their schedule.... I told them that I saw it and you told me.. I don't know what the heck they are doing... but I don't know where else to check for this date.. Can you help me with this and then I can send it to them and they can see for them selves...  thank you    Barbara
